title: China's Demographic Collapse: Global Economic and Strategic Implications
description: Analyze the strategic implications of China's rapidly declining demographics, including economic disruption, social instability, and shifts in global power dynamics.
source_document: China's Vanishing Future_ Inside the World's Fastest Demographic Collapse.pdf

key_sources.title: Chinese government demographic data and policy documents
key_sources.why: Official demographic trends and government responses

key_sources.title: U.S. intelligence assessments of Chinese demographic trends
key_sources.why: Strategic assessments of demographic impact on Chinese capabilities

key_sources.title: Economic research on demographic transition impacts
key_sources.why: Systematic analysis of economic consequences of demographic change

expected_outcomes: Map timeline of Chinese demographic collapse and economic impacts
Analyze strategic implications for U.S.-China competition
Document global economic disruption potential from Chinese demographic crisis
Evaluate policy responses to demographic-driven strategic shifts
research_questions: What are the strategic implications of China's demographic collapse for global power dynamics?
How does demographic decline affect Chinese economic and military capabilities?
What opportunities and risks does Chinese demographic crisis create for the U.S.?
How should U.S. policy adapt to demographic-driven changes in Chinese power?
